member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_DATA
member.summary: The CERT_LOGOTYPE_DATA structure contains logotype data.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_DATA.cLogotypeImage
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgLogotypeImage array.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_DATA.rgLogotypeImage
member.summary: An array of structures that contain the logotype images. The cLogotypeImage member contains the number of elements in this array.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_DATA.cLogotypeAudio
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgLogotypeAudio array.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_DATA.rgLogotypeAudio
member.summary: An array of structures that contain the logotype audio clips. The cLogotypeAudio member contains the number of elements in this array.
